title: Borders, 1820–22
creditline: Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum
description: Black parallel bamboo strips on pink ground. Two borders to a width. Shading of strips changes direction approximately half way across each border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Borders, 1820–22.
1820–22. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum. 1950-59-10.
